commands.name: commit
commands.description: Git commit with automatic agent identity

commands.name: convoy
commands.description: Track batches of work across rigs

commands.name: done
commands.description: Signal work ready for merge queue

commands.name: handoff
commands.description: Hand off to a fresh session, work continues from hook

commands.name: hook
commands.description: Show or attach work on your hook

commands.name: park
commands.description: Park work on a gate for async resumption

commands.name: release
commands.description: Release stuck in_progress issues back to pending

commands.name: resume
commands.description: Resume from parked work or check for handoff messages

commands.name: sling
commands.description: Assign work to an agent (THE unified work dispatch command)

commands.name: unsling
commands.description: Remove work from an agent's hook

commands.name: agents
commands.description: Switch between Gas Town agent sessions

commands.name: mayor
commands.description: Manage the Mayor (Chief of Staff for cross-rig coordination)

commands.name: polecat
commands.description: Manage polecats (ephemeral workers, one task then nuked)

commands.name: witness
commands.description: Manage the Witness (per-rig polecat health monitor)

commands.name: broadcast
commands.description: Send a nudge message to all workers

commands.name: dnd
commands.description: Toggle Do Not Disturb mode for notifications

commands.name: nudge
commands.description: Send a synchronous message to any Gas Town worker

commands.name: peek
commands.description: View recent output from a polecat or crew session

commands.name: start
commands.description: Start Gas Town or a crew workspace

commands.name: up
commands.description: Bring up all Gas Town services

commands.name: crew
commands.description: Manage crew workers (persistent workspaces for humans)

commands.name: git-init
commands.description: Initialize git repository for a Gas Town HQ

commands.name: init
commands.description: Initialize current directory as a Gas Town rig

commands.name: install
commands.description: Create a new Gas Town HQ (workspace)

commands.name: worktree
commands.description: Create worktree in another rig for cross-rig work

commands.name: completion
commands.description: Generate the autocompletion script for the specified shell

commands.name: hooks
commands.description: List all Claude Code hooks in the workspace

commands.name: issue
commands.description: Manage current issue for status line display

commands.name: theme
commands.description: View or set tmux theme for the current rig

commands.name: uninstall
commands.description: Remove Gas Town from the system

commands.name: checkpoint
commands.description: Manage session checkpoints for crash recovery

commands.name: costs
commands.description: Show costs for running Claude sessions [DISABLED]

commands.name: dashboard
commands.description: Start the convoy tracking web dashboard

commands.name: doctor
commands.description: Run health checks on the workspace

commands.name: feed
commands.description: Show real-time activity feed from beads and gt events

commands.name: info
commands.description: Show Gas Town information and what's new

commands.name: prime
commands.description: Output role context for current directory

commands.name: stale
commands.description: Check if the gt binary is stale

commands.name: thanks
commands.description: Thank the human contributors to Gas Town

commands.name: whoami
commands.description: Show current identity for mail commands

commands.name: cycle
commands.description: Cycle between sessions in the same group
